definitions.definition: Not in order ; marked by disorder or disarray .
examples: The books and papers are in a disorderly state.

definitions.definition: Not acting in an orderly way, as the functions of the body or mind.
Not complying with the restraints of order and law; unruly ; lawless .
Offensive to good morals and public decency.

main_definition: Not in order ; marked by disorder or disarray .
secondary_definitions: Not acting in an orderly way, as the functions of the body or mind.
Not complying with the restraints of order and law; unruly ; lawless .
( law ) Offensive to good morals and public decency.
